entry.title: WIND WARNING, Willow Creek (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:39 a.m. MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 12.8Â°C

Observed at: Claresholm 3:00 PM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
Temperature: 12.8°C

Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 90. High 15. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 2:08 PM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this evening. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 90 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 late this evening then light near midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 2:08 PM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
